```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
# load libraries ----
library(DT)

source("scripts/render_collection.R")

# Make the JS table
dt <- datatable(
  make_collection_table(),
  #extensions = c("SearchBuilder", "DateTime"),
  escape = FALSE,
  # Make cell values html enabled
  rownames = FALSE,
  # Remove 1, 2, 3 labels
  options = list(
    autowidth = TRUE,
    search = list(regex = TRUE),
    pageLength = 100, # Show 100 results
    dom = 'ft', # Don't allow to change how many results are displayed
    # dom = "Qlfrtip",
    # searchBuilder = TRUE,
    search = list(return = TRUE)
  )
)

dt
```
